vote.title: A resolution authorizing an additional retention payment for Christopher J. Caso, Interim City Attorney, during the time it takes to select a permanent City Attorney, payable in one payment beginning on April 1, 2020, and ending on April 30, 2020, or until a new City Attorney is appointed - Not to exceed $10,000.00 - Financing:  General Fund
